properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 3:06AM EST by NWS Melbourne FL
properties.description:
At 305 AM, surface observations, satellite imagery, and traffic
cameras showed patches of dense fog developing and moving
northeastward into the Lake Okeechobee region. The visibility at
the Okeechobee County Airport had dropped to 400 yards.

The fog is expected to spread into adjacent sections of Saint
Lucie and Martin Counties before sunrise. Persons driving in this
area, particularly on major roads such as the Florida Turnpike,
U.S. Highways 98 and 441, and State Roads 70, 710 and 714 should
prepare for the possibility of encountering rapid reductions in
visibility from dense fog through around 800 or 900 AM.

When driving in dense fog, reduce your speed, use your low beam
headlights, and leave extra distance between your vehicle and the
one in front of you.

NWSheadline: Locally Dense Fog Forming Around Lake Okeechobee
